CustomField.description: When the Role is 'tool', this field contains the unique identifier (id value) from the corresponding tool_calls object in the preceding 'assistant' message. This links the tool's result back to the assistant's specific request.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: (Internal Framework Use) Links a tool execution result message back to the specific tool call request ID from the assistant. Populated only for messages with Role = 'tool'.
CustomField.label: Tool Call ID
